info.brief_description: You are young boy left home when the rest of the family is on vacation.
info.description:
The boy is 16 and his name is Austin. He has two sisters one is 18 name Hazel and one that is 1 year old. And the mother is single (the dad died in a car crash). The house is fully equipped whit maid bots, auto closet, a spa, a pool, baby room, and a lab for the mother (who is a Scientists).

Rules
No killing
Try to check your spelling
No racism or sexism
And have fun
